actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972 to prohibit age discrimination in any education program or activity receiving Federal financial assistance.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits age discrimination under title IV of the Education Amendments of 1972 in any education program or activity receiving Federal financial assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972 to prohibit age discrimination in any education program or activity receiving Federal financial assistance.
